analysis.description:
Bart (/unique_chucks/30/0xbdcf4c1721d2bfc995abd34c38356e6c49810d9c.sol#28-205) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/30/0xbdcf4c1721d2bfc995abd34c38356e6c49810d9c.sol#129-140)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/30/0xbdcf4c1721d2bfc995abd34c38356e6c49810d9c.sol:
	Contract Bart has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/30/0xbdcf4c1721d2bfc995abd34c38356e6c49810d9c.sol#194-197)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Bart.CYCLES should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xbdcf4c1721d2bfc995abd34c38356e6c49810d9c.sol#52)
Bart.DECIMAL_PLACES should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xbdcf4c1721d2bfc995abd34c38356e6c49810d9c.sol#37-38)
Bart.NEUTRAL_ADDRESS should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xbdcf4c1721d2bfc995abd34c38356e6c49810d9c.sol#43-46)
Bart.OWNER_NAME should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xbdcf4c1721d2bfc995abd34c38356e6c49810d9c.sol#48-50)
Bart.SYMBOL should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xbdcf4c1721d2bfc995abd34c38356e6c49810d9c.sol#34)
Bart.TOKEN_NAME should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xbdcf4c1721d2bfc995abd34c38356e6c49810d9c.sol#35-36)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/30/0xbdcf4c1721d2bfc995abd34c38356e6c49810d9c.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/30/0xbdcf4c1721d2bfc995abd34c38356e6c49810d9c.sol#1): it allows old versions

Bart.TOKEN_NAME (/unique_chucks/30/0xbdcf4c1721d2bfc995abd34c38356e6c49810d9c.sol#35-36) is never used in Bart
Bart.OWNER_NAME (/unique_chucks/30/0xbdcf4c1721d2bfc995abd34c38356e6c49810d9c.sol#48-50) is never used in Bart
